translations: n.离题；无关之事物；不合时宜

phrs.translation: 不恰当, 无关系, 无相关性

sentences.sentence: The fear of irrelevancy will haunt European leaders in 2010.
sentences.translation: 2010年欧洲领导人缠身于其他不相干事物.他们制定了新的法规：里斯本条约。

sentences.sentence: But stretch a topic too far and usually it will collapse into irrelevancy.
sentences.translation: 但若是扩展太远，往往因为离题而写出失败的文章。

sentences.sentence: That I am trapped in this particular irrelevancy is never more apparent to me than when I am home.
sentences.translation: 这个不相干的问题困扰着我，在我返回老家后尤为明显。
